tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (VP (VBG Wearing) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN hair)) (ADVP (IN down) (PP (TO to) (NP (NN school) (NN tomorrow) (-LRB- -LRB-))))) (: :)))
